name: Worn Sonata
description:
An old man, named Darius, with a haunted by his mind during his walk around his city he got a glance at a poster that read the Inward Spirit.  The poster had the name, address and a phone number to call. 

He decided to call and got a reply from a wispy old man.

"I can show you what lies dormant and help you get rid of your traumas..."

Those words rung through Darius's mind and with some thought he told the owner he would drop by and see what this treatment was about. The call ended and Darius walked through the city with a sun starting to set.

Looking for this Inward Spirit.

The game is focused on exploring a space that will let you look through a manifestation of an old man's mind. Having a eerie atmosphere and having heavy undertones; this game is for those want a brief psychological game that will leave a bit to ponder once they are done.
